additional_info:
Storeroom, Furniture, Technique, Internet, Cable-TV, Window guards, Heating system: gas, Hot water: electricity 
 A modern and newly renovated studio is located in a historical building on a quiet street just 5-minutes walk from subway station Freedom Square, Marriott Hotels and the National Museum.  Studio is appropriate for 2-4 member groups or a family. You will enjoy your stay in this cozy and friendly environment equipped with comfortable bedding, air-conditioning, cable-TV, Internet, refrigerator.
Restrictions: minimum 2 nights. Pets are not allowed.
Price: 50$ pr night. Additional 10$ per extra guest per night.

details.address: Tbilisi, Old Tbilisi,  Mtatsminda, Vachnadze st.
